Walkthrough

A comprehensive walkthrough of Elden Ring, covering everything in one playthrough.

Trouble following directions? Read the explanation of directions in the FAQ.
Assume that the starting point is from the end of the previous step, unless stated otherwise.

If you'd rather explore on your own, check out the NPC Walkthrough instead.

Exhausting dialogue: Talk to the NPC until they have no new dialogue.
NPC Summons: Summoning for a boss is always optional and never needed to progress a questline.
